lead_paragraph: A museum devoted to Leo Tolstoy reopened recently in the village in Chechnya where he spent his formative years as a writer in the 1850s.
snippet: A museum devoted to Leo Tolstoy reopened recently in the village in Chechnya where he spent his formative years as a writer in the 1850s.

headline.main: Tolstoy Recalled Fondly in Chechen Museum
headline.seo: Tolstoy Is Recalled Fondly in a Village Museum in Chechnya
headline.print_headline: Tolstoy Recalled Fondly in Chechen Museum
